players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice and not Charlie? That seems odd."
You: "I am not the mafioso, Diana is trying to mislead us. Why would I kill Charlie if I wanted to be caught so quickly? Bob makes a good point—Diana's investigation seems suspicious."
Bob: "I am voting for Diana. Her claim doesn't add up and she investigated the wrong person."
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob, if you vote me out, town loses. Trust the investigation."
You: "Diana's claim is too convenient and her investigation timing is suspicious. Bob and I agree she might be trying to frame me to save herself."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice and not Charlie? That seems odd."
Alice: "I am not the mafioso, Diana is trying to mislead us. Why would I kill Charlie if I wanted to be caught so quickly? Bob makes a good point—Diana's investigation seems suspicious."
You: "I am voting for Diana. Her claim doesn't add up and she investigated the wrong person."
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob, if you vote me out, town loses. Trust the investigation."
Alice: "Diana's claim is too convenient and her investigation timing is suspicious. Bob and I agree she might be trying to frame me to save herself."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice and not Charlie? That seems odd."
Alice: "I am not the mafioso, Diana is trying to mislead us. Why would I kill Charlie if I wanted to be caught so quickly? Bob makes a good point—Diana's investigation seems suspicious."
Bob: "I am voting for Diana. Her claim doesn't add up and she investigated the wrong person."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob, if you vote me out, town loses. Trust the investigation."
Alice: "Diana's claim is too convenient and her investigation timing is suspicious. Bob and I agree she might be trying to frame me to save herself."
